facts.text: I'm a stunning mix of jet black and bright white - like a tuxedo fish! My dramatic colors make me a show-stopper.
My black coloring comes from special genes that breeders selected over many generations. It takes years to create fish like me!
I may look different from Finding Nemo, but I still love hosting in anemones just like my orange cousins!

profile.diet: Pellets, frozen mysis shrimp, and brine shrimp
